title: RACING EVENT detail page Â» RACING SESSIONS
user_story:
As a visitor
I want the RACING EVENT detail page to show all connected RACING SESSIONS
So I can ...
description:
* The RACING EVENT detail page contains a section with a list of all connected RACING SESSIONS.
* Each RACING SESSION in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each RACING SESSION in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each RACING SESSION in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no RACING SESSION connected to the RACING EVENT then the section is not displayed at all.
